slider.label: Beyond chat range diminish factor:
slider.name: FSBeyondNearbyChatColorDiminishFactor
slider.tool_tip: The factor used to diminish the actual chat color if the sender is beyond normal chat range (0 = dim, 1 = bright)

check_box.name: FSColorIMsDistinctly
check_box.label: Color IM/Group chat distinctly in console:

check_box.name: FSColorUsername
check_box.label: Color usernames distinctly
check_box.tool_tip: Displays usernames in a different color

check_box.name: NameTagShowFriends
check_box.label: Color friend name tags distinctly
check_box.tool_tip: Displays friend name tags in a different color

slider.label: Name tag Z-Offset:
slider.name: FSNameTagZOffsetCorrection
slider.tool_tip: Changes the Z-offset for avatar name tags. Default 0

check_box.name: FSTagShowDistance
check_box.label: Show distance in name tag
check_box.tool_tip: Show distance from an avatar in their name tag

check_box.name: FSTagShowDistanceColors
check_box.label: Color name tags based on distance:

panel.name: client_tags_panel
panel.text: What tags would you want to see?
Use a list to display Viewertags?

combo_box.item.name: Download Clienttags
combo_box.item.label: Download Tag List at Viewer Start

color_swatch.name: MapPickRadiusColor
color_swatch.tool_tip: Controls the color of the pick range on the minimap. The size of the pick range can be adjusted with the Pick radius setting.

slider.name: MapPickRadiusTransparency
slider.tool_tip: Controls the opacity of the pick range on the minimap. The size of the pick range can be adjusted with the Pick radius setting.

check_box.name: MiniMapChatRing
check_box.label: Display rings on the mini map indicating the whisper, say and shout chat ranges:

color_swatch.name: preferences_search_bg_color
color_swatch.tool_tip: Choose preferences search highlight Background Color

color_swatch.name: preferences_search_font_color
color_swatch.tool_tip: Choose preferences search highlight Font Color

check_box.name: FSScriptDialogNoTransparency
check_box.label: Always show script dialogs on an opaque background

check_box.name: FSGroupNotifyNoTransparency
check_box.label: Always show group notices on an opaque background

check_box.name: override_pie_color_checkbox
check_box.label: Override pie menu background color and opacity:

slider.label: Fade out:
slider.name: pie_menu_fade_out
slider.tool_tip: Choose the amount of fade out to the pie edges
